Package no.uis.party

Class QueueController

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uis.party.QueueController
  • @Controller
public class QueueController
extends java.lang.Object
    View controller for the welcome page with leader boards and the queueing functionality

    • Method Detail

      • queueUp

        @MessageMapping("/party/queueUp")
public void queueUp​(SocketMessage socketMessage)
        Socket message mapping response method invoked when a user queues up as a given player role. This adds a new player object to the party queue in the party manager if the player is not already in the queue or game.
        Parameters:
        socketMessage - Message containing
        See Also:
        PartyManager

      • newEntry

        @RequestMapping("/welcomePage")
public java.lang.String newEntry​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                 @RequestParam("username")
                                 java.lang.String username,
                                 @RequestParam("id")
                                 java.lang.String id)
        Renders the welcome page with scoreboard and the game queueing functionality.
        Parameters:
        model - Model with attributes used to send data to the view and parse with Thymeleaf
        username - Name of the player
        id - ID of the player
        Returns:
        HTML response page

      • createTop5ScoreList

        public java.util.ArrayList<ScoreData> createTop5ScoreList()
        Created a sorted list of five ScoreData objects sorted and return it. Used in the newEntry method to show the top 5 best players of the game.
